data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Palawan you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Palawan, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 750,600 people living in Palawan, Philippines. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.section_summary: On average, 38 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Palawan, Philippines.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Palawan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Palawan, Philippines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Palawano, Brooke's Point people might believe through him.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Palawan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Palawan, Philippines to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Palawan, Philippines has a population of 750,600.

We estimate Palawan has 104,557 people who might know Jesus, 578,228 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 67,814 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Palawan a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
